name: Rainbow Macarons
desc: Small, multi-colored round pastries. There's a saying in Fontaine that a dessert spread without macarons is like having the many waters bereft of their source. Never mind the dessert artists in Fontainian kitchens — even dessert dilettantes on the streets know this adage by heart.

value.text: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

value.name: Rainbow Macarons
value.desc:
Rainbow Macarons

Small, multicolored little pastries. Their crispy outer shell packages a sweet, soft center, each refined to perfection.
There is a saying in Fontaine that "a dessert spread without macarons is like having the many waters bereft of their source."

customize.name: Recipe: Rainbow Macarons
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Rainbow Macarons.

customize.name: Delicious Rainbow Macarons
customize.desc: Small, multi-colored round pastries. The crisp shell wraps a thick, soft filling, and all is right with the world. Try one, and it shall be as if a little kitten's nose is nuzzling against your chest. Surely no one could help but fall for such an experience.

customize.name: Suspicious Rainbow Macarons
customize.desc: Small, multi-colored round pastries. The first one feels empty, the second is slanted, the third uneven, and the fourth's a fickle mix... As expected of a Fontainian dessert dictated by dozens of details, this will take more work to master.

customize.name: Navia
customize.desc: The current President of Spina di Rosula, who is lovely, dutiful, and a great boss.

customize.name: "Pick What You Like!"
customize.desc: Navia's specialty. "Come on, pick the one you like!" Along with the familiar cries of joy, you see before your eyes the aesthetically pleasing double-layered dessert stand and the neat rows of macarons with different expressions painted onto them. One thought suddenly fascinates you... What expression would Navia make if you were to give in to greed and steal all of them for yourself?

customize.name: Rainbow Macarons
customize.desc: Small, multi-colored round pastries. There's a saying in Fontaine that a dessert spread without macarons is like having the many waters bereft of their source. Never mind the dessert artists in Fontainian kitchens — even dessert dilettantes on the streets know this adage by heart.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Almond
customize.desc: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

customize.name: Bulle Fruit
customize.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.
